name: Get Away
content: I can't believe it happened to us
我无法相信发生的一切
Tell me how did we got lost in it all
告诉我们 我们是如何迷失的
Maybe we could do with a change
或许我们可以做出改变
So pack your bags and sleep tight
打好包裹 好好睡觉
因为明天 宝贝 我们要好好做事
Gotta find a way out of town
Anywhere you want  I don't care
你想去任何地方 我们不在乎
Just as long as you are there
我知道的一切就是我们不能留下来 多一天
打电话给公司 告诉他们你结束了
改变你的语音信箱 我现在不在家
Just enough to get some space now
So pack your bags and sleep tight
打好包裹 好好睡觉
Gotta find a way out of town
Anywhere you want  I don't care
你想去任何地方 我们不在乎
Just as long as you are there
我知道的一切就是我们不能留下来 多一天
We can sit  we can talk
We can make love for hours
Gotta find a way out of town
Anywhere you want  I don't care
你想去任何地方 我们不在乎
Just as long as you are there
All I know is that we can't stay
我知道的一切就是我们不能留下来
Anywhere you want  I don't care
你想去任何地方 我们不在乎
Just as long as you are there
我知道的一切就是我们不能留下来 多一天
